## Question 2

```{r}
exam_summary <-
  grades %>%
  summarise("Mean grade" = mean(Exam, na.rm = TRUE),
                      "Median grade" = median(Exam, na.rm = TRUE),
                      "Lowest grade" = min(Exam, na.rm = TRUE),
                      "Highest grade" = max(Exam, na.rm = TRUE))
  
```

```{r}
knitr::kable(exam_summary, format = "markdown")
```
